ShadowQuest

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • ShadowQuest.World

  • public class World
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the entire game world. (Designed to be instantiated just once for the whole game).

        Checks for terrain blocking on the tiledMap
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        returns true if target position is blocked off, false otherwise

      • update

        public void update(double dir_x,
                   double dir_y,
                   double a_on,
                   double t_on,
                   int delta)
            throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Update the game state for a frame.
        Parameters:
        dir_x - The player's movement in the x axis (-1, 0 or 1).
        dir_y - The player's movement in the y axis (-1, 0 or 1).
        a_on - The key used to initiate an attack
        t_on - The key used to initiate an interaction
        delta - Time passed since last frame (milliseconds).
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException - General exception thrown by Slick library classes

      • render

        public void render(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)
            throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Render the entire screen, so it reflects the current game state.
        Parameters:
        g - The Slick graphics object, used for drawing.
        Throws:
